concept.title: Case 2: Content-based policy (for example, Parental, URL, APN, service control)

section.title: Overview
section.p: NCC provides policy rules based on the Access Point Name (APN) defined in the called station ID.

ul.li: Simulate attachment for a device with Called-station-id = CorporateOnlyAPN1. Verify that NCC allows CCR-I and returns 2001 as result code.
Simulate attachment for a device with Called-station-id = CorporateOnlyAPN2. Verify that NCC fails the CCR-I with result code - 5003 (IP-CAN session Establishment Rejected due to operator policy).

note.p: Ensure that after creating a record, you distribute it to ME. Otherwise, the provisioning will not be successful.

ol.li: Log in to the SM GUI, and navigate to Subscriber Manager and select Devices tab. Click to create a device.
